name: Blas Oronoz
title: Creative Director - Solution Architect
description: Blas Oronoz is a creative director and solution architect with more than ten years of experience in the digital industry. As a digital nomad, he has worked with clients in a wide variety of areas, from travel services to music production, hospitality, sports, and events. He is passionate about creating intuitive, user-friendly, and easy-to-understand solutions, with a background in software design and development and a strong belief in the power of creativity. He is an active member of the Interactive Design Foundation. Where he helps create and implement solutions for the digital world through the methodology of Design Thinking.
